data.title: How to contact PlayStation Support
data.meta_description: Find out which online support tools you can use to troubleshoot your issue, and how to contact PlayStation Support.
data.text:
Need to get in touch?

Before you contact PlayStation Support, look up your issue to find helpful information and the relevant contact method.

Can't find your issue?

Try visiting one of the guides below for more information.

Need to arrange a PlayStation repair?

Follow the link below to find out how you can arrange an in-warranty repair for a PlayStation product.

Can’t connect your PlayStation console to the internet?

Try the PlayStation Repairs tool for connectivity troubleshooting.

Having issues with system software?

If you’re having issues with your console's system software, start in Safe Mode and update or reinstall the system software using a USB storage device.

Need help with your direct.playstation.com experience?

If you're having issues with a direct.playstation.com order, contact us.
